lst.name: sentence
lst.str: President Corazon Aquino's spokesman said last week that she was committed to launching the program, which limits land holdings to seven hectares, by using her sweeping powers of rule by decree before a new Congress convenes in July.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "They are going to be an interesting model for many other countries because they opened a dialogue on the reforms to every sector of the population and even international institutions," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Presidential spokesman Teodoro Benigno said the land reform program, estimated to cost about 44 billion pesos, would be implemented in four phases and benefit 2.64 mln farmers.
